attributes.action: Suspend MPs expenses and salaries on 30th March, until Brexit is resolved.
attributes.background:
We pay Parliament to do a job, at the moment it feels like they have one job to do.

If I don't do my job, I don't get paid, so...

Day after we leave the EU, if Brexit isn't resolved, that job is not done, no pay; should focus a few minds.

They had One Job!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because MPs' salaries and expenses are the responsibility of the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority and not the UK Government and Parliament.

https://www.theipsa.org.uk/
